label: Simple JSON source
yarrrml:
prefixes:
 ex: "http://example.com/"

mappings:
  person:
    sources:
      - ['data.json~jsonpath', '$.persons[*]']
    s: http://example.com/$(firstname)
    po:
      - [a, foaf:Person]
      - [ex:name, $(firstname)]

label: Combination of a JSON and a CSV source
yarrrml:
prefixes:
  ex: "http://example.com/"

mappings:
  person:
    sources:
      - ['persons.json~jsonpath', '$.persons[*]']
    s: http://example.com/person/$(firstname)
    po:
      - [a, foaf:Person]
      - [ex:name, $(firstname)]
      - p: ex:likes
        o:
         - mapping: movie
           condition:
            function: equal
            parameters:
              - [str1, $(movie)]
              - [str2, $(slug)]
  movie:
    sources:
      - ['movies.csv~csv']
    s: http://example.com/movie/$(slug)
    po:
      - [a, schema:Movie]
      - [schema:name, $(title)]
      - [ex:year, $(year)]

data.value:
slug,title,year
sw,Star Wars,1977
fotr,The Fellowship of the Ring,2001
wam,We Are Marshall,2006

label: Facebook JSON data
yarrrml:
prefixes:
  cocacola-fb: http://coca-cola.com/facebook/
  emit: http://coca-cola.com/emit/
  prov-said: http://semweb.datasciencelab.be/ns/prov-said/
  ov: http://open.vocab.org/terms/
  tsioc: http://rdfs.org/sioc/types#
  fabio: http://purl.org/spar/fabio/

base: http://example.com/base#

sources:
  api:
    access: data.json
    referenceFormulation: jsonpath
    iterator: "$.data[*]"

mappings:
  facebook_post:
    source:
      - api
    subject: cocacola-fb:$(id)
    predicateobjects:
      - [a, [prov:Entity, ov:MicroblogPost, schema:SocialMediaPosting, tsioc:MicroblogPost]]
      - [[prov:label, schema:articleBody], $(message)]
      - [schema:mainEntityOfPage, $(permalink_url), schema:URL]
      - [prov:wasAttributedTo, http://coca-cola.com/#me~iri]
      - predicate: prov:wasGeneratedBy
        object:
          mapping: emit
          condition:
            function: equal
            parameters:
              - [str1, $(id)]
              - [str2, $(id)]
  emit:
    source:
      - api
    subject: emit:$(id)
    predicateobjects:
      - [a, prov:Activity]
      - [prov:type, prov-said:EmitMessage~iri]
      - [prov:wasStartedBy, http://coca-cola.com/#me~iri]
      - [[prov:startedAtTime, prov:endedAtTime], $(created_time)]

label: YARRRML Targets for specifying output
yarrrml:
sources:
  supergirl-source:
    access: "Supergirl.xml"
    referenceFormulation: xpath
    iterator: "/Supergirl/Character"
targets:
  target1: ["/data/dump1.nt~dcat", "ntriples"]
  target2: ["/data/dump2.ttl~void", "turtle"]
mappings:
  person:
    sources: supergirl-source
    subjects:
      - value: "http://example.org/$(./@id)"
        targets: target1
    predicateobjects:
      - predicates:
        - value: foaf:name
          targets: target2
        objects: "$(./name)"
      - predicates: foaf:nickname
        objects: "$(./nickname)"

label: GTFS CSV data
yarrrml:
prefixes:
  rr: http://www.w3.org/ns/r2rml#
  foaf: http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/
  xsd: http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#
  rdfs: http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#
  dc: http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/
  rev: http://purl.org/stuff/rev#
  gtfs: http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#
  geo: http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#
  schema: http://schema.org/
  dct: http://purl.org/dc/terms/
  rml: http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/rml#
  ql: http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/ql#
  rdf: http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#

mappings:
  agency:
    sources:
      - [AGENCY.csv~csv]
    s: http://transport.linkeddata.es/madrid/agency/$(agency_id)
    po:
      - [a, gtfs:Agency]
      - [foaf:page, $(agency_url)~iri]
      - [foaf:name,$(agency_name)]
      - [gtfs:timeZone,$(agency_timezone)]
      - [dct:language,$(agency_lang)]
      - [foaf:phone,$(agency_phone)]
      - [gtfs:fareUrl,$(agency_fare_url)~iri]
  routes:
    sources:
      - [ROUTES.csv~csv]
    s: http://transport.linkeddata.es/madrid/metro/routes/$(route_id)
    po:
      - [a, gtfs:Route]
      - [gtfs:shortName, $(route_short_name)]
      - [gtfs:longName, $(route_long_name)]
      - [dct:description, $(route_desc)]
      - [gtfs:routeType, http://transport.linkeddata.es/resource/RouteType/$(route_type)~iri]
      - [gtfs:routeUrl, $(route_url)~iri]
      - [gtfs:color, $(route_color)]
      - [gtfs:textColor, $(route_text_color)]
      - p: gtfs:agency
        o:
          - mapping: agency
            condition:
              function: equal
              parameters:
                - [str1, $(agency_id)]
                - [str2, $(agency_id)]

data.value:

label: Basic LDES of sensor data
yarrrml:
# Generate an initial basic LDES and members.

prefixes:
  ex: http://example.org/
  dcterms: http://purl.org/dc/terms/

sources:
  data-source: [readings-1.csv~csv]

targets:
  ldes-target:
    access: out-ldes.nq
    type: void
    serialization: nquads
    ldes:
      id: https://example.org/ldes
      timestampPath: ex:ts
      versionOfPath: dcterms:isVersionOf

mappings:
  temperature-reading:
    sources: data-source
    subjects:
      - value: ex:$(SensorID)
        targets: ldes-target

    po:
      - [a, ex:Thermometer]
      - [ex:temp, $(Temperature)]
      - [ex:ts, $(Timestamp), xsd:dateTime]
      - [dcterms:isVersionOf, ex:$(SensorID)]

    changeDetection:
      create:
        explicit: false
      update:
        explicit: false
        watchedProperties: [$(Temperature)]

label: Updated LDES of sensor data
yarrrml:
# Only generate members if temperature changes.

prefixes:
  ex: http://example.org/
  dcterms: http://purl.org/dc/terms/

sources:
  data-source: [readings-2.csv~csv]

targets:
  ldes-target:
    access: out-ldes.nq
    type: void
    serialization: nquads
    ldes:
      id: https://example.org/ldes
      timestampPath: ex:ts
      versionOfPath: dcterms:isVersionOf

mappings:
  temperature-reading:
    sources: data-source
    subjects:
      - value: ex:$(SensorID)
        targets: ldes-target

    po:
      - [a, ex:Thermometer]
      - [ex:temp, $(Temperature)]
      - [ex:ts, $(Timestamp), xsd:dateTime]
      - [dcterms:isVersionOf, ex:$(SensorID)]

    changeDetection:
      create:
        explicit: false
      update:
        explicit: false
        watchedProperties: [$(Temperature)]

label: ERA - basic RINF mapping
yarrrml:
prefixes:
  idlab-fn: "http://example.com/idlab/function/"
  grel: "http://users.ugent.be/~bjdmeest/function/grel.ttl#"
  wgs: "http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#"
  geosparql: "http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#"
  eu-country: "http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/country/"
  rdfs: "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
  xsd: "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#"
  era: "http://data.europa.eu/949/"
  era-op-types: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/op-types/rinf/"
  era-tenclass: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/ten-classifications/rinf/"
  era-linecat: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/line-category/rinf/"
  era-fc: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/freight-corridor/rinf/"
  era-gaugings: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/gaugings/rinf/"
  era-ntg: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/nominal-track-gauges/rinf/"

sources:
  op-source: ['rinf_test.xml~xpath','/RINFData/OperationalPoint']
  track-source: ['rinf_test.xml~xpath','/RINFData/OperationalPoint/OPTrack']

mappings:
  operational-point:
    sources:
      - op-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)
    po:
      - [a, era:OperationalPoint]
      - [era:opName, $(OPName/@Value)]
      - [era:opType,"era-op-types:$(OPType/@Value)~iri" ]
      - [era:uopid, $(UniqueOPID/@Value)]
  
  op-track:
    sources:
      - track-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/$(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)
    po:
      - [a, era:Track]
      - [rdfs:label, $(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)]
      - [era:trackId, $(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)]
      - [era:verificationINF, '$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IDE_ECVerification" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)']
      - [era:demonstrationINF, '$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IDE_EIDemonstration" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)']
      - [era:tenClassification, 'era-tenclass:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_TENClass" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']
      - [era:lineCategory, 'era-linecat:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_LineCat" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']
      - [era:freightCorridor, 'era-fc:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_FreightCorridor" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']  

  link-track-to-operational-point:
    sources:
      - op-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)
    po:
      - p: era:track
        o: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/$(OPTrack/OPTrackIdentification/@Value)~iri

label: ERA - actual RINF mapping
yarrrml:
prefixes:
  idlab-fn: "http://example.com/idlab/function/"
  grel: "http://users.ugent.be/~bjdmeest/function/grel.ttl#"
  wgs: "http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#"
  geosparql: "http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#"
  eu-country: "http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/country/"
  rdfs: "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
  xsd: "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#"
  era: "http://data.europa.eu/949/"
  era-op-types: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/op-types/rinf/"
  era-tenclass: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/ten-classifications/rinf/"
  era-linecat: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/line-category/rinf/"
  era-fc: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/freight-corridor/rinf/"
  era-gaugings: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/gaugings/rinf/"
  era-ntg: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/nominal-track-gauges/rinf/"

sources:
  op-source: ['rinf_test.xml~xpath','/RINFData/OperationalPoint']
  track-source: ['rinf_test.xml~xpath','/RINFData/OperationalPoint/OPTrack']

mappings:
  operational-point:
    sources:
      - op-source
    s:
      function: grel:array_join
      parameters:
        - [grel:p_array_a, "http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/"]
        - parameter: grel:p_array_a
          value:
            function: grel:string_sha1
            parameters:
              - [ grel:valueParameter, "$(parent::*/MemberStateCode/@Code)/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)/$(OPType/@Value)/$((@ValidityDateStart,'None'\)[1])_$((@ValidityDateEnd,'None'\)[1])" ]
    po:
      - [a, era:OperationalPoint]
      - [era:canonicalURI,"http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)~iri"]
      - [rdfs:label, $(OPName/@Value)]
      - [era:opName, $(OPName/@Value)]
      - [era:uopid, $(UniqueOPID/@Value)]
      - [era:tafTAPCode,"$(OPTafTapCode[@IsApplicable='Y']/@Value)"]
      - [era:opType,"era-op-types:$(OPType/@Value)~iri" ]
      - [geosparql:hasGeometry, "http://data.europa.eu/949/locations/$(OPGeographicLocation/@Longitude)/$(OPGeographicLocation/@Latitude)~iri"]
      - [wgs:location, "http://data.europa.eu/949/locations/$(OPGeographicLocation/@Longitude)/$(OPGeographicLocation/@Latitude)~iri"]
      - [era:hasAbstraction, http://data.europa.eu/949/topology/netElements/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)~iri]
      - [era:validityStartDate, "$(@ValidityDateStart)", xsd:date]
      - [era:validityEndDate, "$(@ValidityDateEnd)", xsd:date]
  
  op-track:
    sources:
      - track-source
    s:
      function: grel:array_join
      parameters:
        - [grel:p_array_a, "http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/"]
        - parameter: grel:p_array_a
          value:
            function: grel:string_sha1
            parameters:
              - [ grel:valueParameter, "$(parent::*/UniqueOPID/@Value)/$(parent::*/OPType/@Value)/$((parent::*/@ValidityDateStart,'None'\)[1])_$((parent::*/@ValidityDateEnd,'None'\)[1])/$(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)/$((@ValidityDateStart,'None'\)[1])_$((@ValidityDateEnd,'None'\)[1])" ]
    po:
      - [a, era:Track]
      - [era:canonicalURI,"http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/$(parent::*/UniqueOPID/@Value)_$(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)~iri"]
      - [rdfs:label, $(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)]
      - [era:imCode, $(OPTrackIMCode/@Value)]
      - [era:trackId, $(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)]
      - [era:verificationINF, '$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IDE_ECVerification" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)']
      - [era:demonstrationINF, '$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IDE_EIDemonstration" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)']
      - [era:tenClassification, 'era-tenclass:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_TENClass" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']
      - [era:lineCategory, 'era-linecat:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_LineCat" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']
      - [era:freightCorridor, 'era-fc:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_FreightCorridor" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']  
      - [era:validityStartDate , "$(@ValidityDateStart)", xsd:date]
      - [era:validityEndDate, "$(@ValidityDateEnd)", xsd:date]

  link-track-to-operational-point:
    sources:
      - track-source
    s:
      function: grel:array_join
      parameters:
        - [grel:p_array_a, "http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/"]
        - parameter: grel:p_array_a
          value:
            function: grel:string_sha1
            parameters:
              - [ grel:valueParameter, "$(parent::*/parent::*/MemberStateCode/@Code)/$(parent::*/UniqueOPID/@Value)/$(parent::*/OPType/@Value)/$((parent::*/@ValidityDateStart,'None'\)[1])_$((parent::*/@ValidityDateEnd,'None'\)[1])" ]
    po:
      - p: era:track
        o:
          type: iri
          function: grel:array_join
          parameters:
            - [grel:p_array_a, "http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/"]
            - parameter: grel:p_array_a
              value:
                function: grel:string_sha1
                parameters:
                  - [ grel:valueParameter, "$(parent::*/UniqueOPID/@Value)/$(parent::*/OPType/@Value)/$((parent::*/@ValidityDateStart,'None'\)[1])_$((parent::*/@ValidityDateEnd,'None'\)[1])/$(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)/$((@ValidityDateStart,'None'\)[1])_$((@ValidityDateEnd,'None'\)[1])"]

label: ERA - extended RINF mapping
yarrrml:
prefixes:
  idlab-fn: "http://example.com/idlab/function/"
  grel: "http://users.ugent.be/~bjdmeest/function/grel.ttl#"
  wgs: "http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#"
  geosparql: "http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#"
  eu-country: "http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/country/"
  rdfs: "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
  xsd: "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#"
  era: "http://data.europa.eu/949/"
  era-op-types: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/op-types/rinf/"
  era-tenclass: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/ten-classifications/rinf/"
  era-linecat: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/line-category/rinf/"
  era-fc: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/freight-corridor/rinf/"
  era-gaugings: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/gaugings/rinf/"
  era-ntg: "http://data.europa.eu/949/concepts/nominal-track-gauges/rinf/"

sources:
  op-source: ['rinf_test.xml~xpath','/RINFData/OperationalPoint']
  track-source: ['rinf_test.xml~xpath','/RINFData/OperationalPoint/OPTrack']
  vehicles-source: ['sample-ERATV.csv~csv']
  vehicles-compatibilities-source: ['compatible-vehicles.csv~csv']

mappings:
  operational-point:
    sources:
      - op-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)
    po:
      - [a, era:OperationalPoint]
      - [era:opName, $(OPName/@Value)]
      - [era:opType,"era-op-types:$(OPType/@Value)~iri" ]
      - [era:uopid, $(UniqueOPID/@Value)]
  
  op-track:
    sources:
      - track-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/$(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)
    po:
      - [a, era:Track]
      - [rdfs:label, $(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)]
      - [era:trackId, $(OPTrackIdentification/@Value)]
      - [era:verificationINF, '$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IDE_ECVerification" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)']
      - [era:demonstrationINF, '$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IDE_EIDemonstration" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)']
      - [era:tenClassification, 'era-tenclass:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_TENClass" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']
      - [era:lineCategory, 'era-linecat:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_LineCat" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']
      - [era:freightCorridor, 'era-fc:$(OPTrackParameter[@ID="IPP_FreightCorridor" and @IsApplicable="Y"]/@Value)~iri']  

  link-track-to-operational-point:
    sources:
      - op-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/operationalPoints/$(UniqueOPID/@Value)
    po:
      - p: era:track
        o: http://data.europa.eu/949/functionalInfrastructure/tracks/$(OPTrack/OPTrackIdentification/@Value)~iri

  vehicles:
    sources:
      - vehicles-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/vehicles/$(VehicleType_Id)
    po:
      - [a, ex:Vehicle]
      - [rdfs:label, $(Type_Name)]
      - [ex:vehicleCategory, ex:vehicleCategory/$(Category_Id)~iri]

  vehicles-categories:
    sources:
      - vehicles-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/vehicleCategories/$(Category_Id)
    po:
      - [a, ex:VehicleCategory]
      - [rdfs:label, $(Category)]

  vehicles-compatibilities:
    sources:
      - vehicles-compatibilities-source
    s: http://data.europa.eu/949/vehicles/$(VehicleType_Id)
